title: My Account Hacked
body: Hi Riot,  My account name is Snarky2020, I am posting this on my brother's account because my password has been changed without my authorization and I know somebody has logged into my account and is playing matches. .I have tried logging in with my password and since 4:30 PM central standard time, I was unable to log in. When I checked my op.gg account, it showed that I had played several matches, when in fact I had not played a game all day (my brother was hogging the computer). The two games that were played today were both on Summoners Rift, and I almost never play on that map. Additionally, the order of the two summoner spells was changed; I always keep my flash in the first slot.

replies.body:
First let me mention that account sharing of any kind is against of the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), and is not a good idea for account security. I definitely recommend not accessing your brother's account in the future. 

In order to complete a recovery of the account, you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our account specialists. Fill out as much info as you can and a specialist will get back to you as soon as they can. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
